languages.text: "Единственная милость, которую можно оказать слуге Архиврага — быстрая смерть. Ереси нет прощения".
"A quick death is the only mercy one can show to a servant of the Archenemy. Heresy cannot be forgiven."
languages.original_text: "Единственная милость, которую можно оказать слуге Архиврага — быстрая смерть. Ереси нет прощения".

traits.locale_text: "Quick death is the only mercy one can show to a servant of the Archenemy. Heresy cannot be forgiven."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "A quick death is the only mercy one can show to a servant of the Archenemy. Heresy cannot be forgiven."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “对混沌大敌的仆人而言，给他们个痛快是唯一的仁慈。异端分子绝对不容宽恕。”
languages.original_text: "A quick death is the only mercy one can show to a servant of the Archenemy. Heresy cannot be forgiven."

traits.locale_text: “对混沌大敌的仆人而言，给他们个痛快是唯一的仁慈。异端分子绝对不容宽恕。”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「速やかな死は渾沌の勢力に協力した者に与えられる唯一の慈悲だ。異端は許されない」
languages.original_text: "A quick death is the only mercy one can show to a servant of the Archenemy. Heresy cannot be forgiven."

traits.locale_text: 「速やかな死は渾沌の勢力に協力した者に与えられる唯一の慈悲だ。異端は許されない」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «La muerte rápida es la única misericordia que se puede mostrar a un siervo del archienemigo. Lo herejía no puede ser perdonada».
languages.original_text: "A quick death is the only mercy one can show to a servant of the Archenemy. Heresy cannot be forgiven."

traits.locale_text: «La muerte rápida es la única misericordia que se puede mostrar a un siervo del archienemigo. Lo herejía no puede ser perdonada».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Ein schneller Tod ist die einzige Gnade, die man einem Diener des Erzfeinds gewähren kann. Ketzerei kann nicht vergeben werden."
languages.original_text: "A quick death is the only mercy one can show to a servant of the Archenemy. Heresy cannot be forgiven."

traits.locale_text: "Ein schneller Tod ist die einzige Gnade, die man einem Diener des Erzfeinds gewähren kann. Ketzerei kann nicht vergeben werden."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Une mort rapide est la seule clémence que l'on peut témoigner à un serviteur du Grand Ennemi. L'hérésie est un crime impardonnable. »
languages.original_text: "A quick death is the only mercy one can show to a servant of the Archenemy. Heresy cannot be forgiven."

traits.locale_text: « Une mort rapide est la seule clémence que l'on peut témoigner à un serviteur du Grand Ennemi. L'hérésie est un crime impardonnable. »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Çabuk bir ölüm, Şerbaşı'nın bir hizmetkârına gösterebileceğim tek merhamettir. Kâfirlik affedilemez."
languages.original_text: "A quick death is the only mercy one can show to a servant of the Archenemy. Heresy cannot be forgiven."

traits.locale_text: "Çabuk bir ölüm, Şerbaşı'nın bir hizmetkârına gösterebileceğim tek merhamettir. Kâfirlik affedilemez."
traits.speaker: Chorda
